name: Pumpkin Roll
description:
Pumpkin Roll is a spooky ball platforming game similar to Marble Blast Gold or Super Monkey Ball. Roll your way across both simple and tricky stages to earn yourself a treat! Avoid various Halloween themed obstacles along the way.

Features:

  • 30 Stages
  • Low Poly Graphics
  • A cute pumpkin
  • Some bone chilling beats

Enjoy the season with this free game as your treat. Happy Halloween! My first 3D game using the Godot engine.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Click and drag mouse to turn the camera

Find more from me here on itch.io, or at my twitter:
https://twitter.com/GummyBear772
